channel.title: Dc when i pickup

item.title: Dc when i pickup
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

ok everytime i pickup an item it logs me off why?if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 3) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12)); if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("No such item."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("nerd learn how to spawn"); } }

Read full topic
